description_1: Discover a new world of knowledge and learning with our app. Get ready for an interactive and comprehensive learning experience.
description_2: Customize your learning experience with our personalized recommendations. Find lessons, articles, and resources that match your interests and level.
description_3: Begin your learning journey with Sintir. Join now and see how your learning can become more interactive and exciting. Choose your path and start learning today!
teacher_tools_description: Get ready to explore a set of tools designed to support your educational experience
teacher_features_description: From dynamic lesson plans to instant feedback, discover features that help you engage and motivate your students.
teacher_start_today_description: Start your journey now and connect with a network of educators. Let's make a difference in education together!

content_description: Browse the course lessons and tests in an organized and easy step-by-step way.
students_description: Learn about students enrolled in this course and track their progress easily.
students_reviews_description: Read students’ opinions and ratings about the course to get a clearer idea of the learning experience.

reports_description: Monitor the course performance through detailed reports showing progress, interaction, and results.

choose_role_student: Welcome to the world of learning and knowledge! Discover exciting content and develop your skills. We are here to support your educational journey. Start your learning adventure now!
choose_role_teacher: Welcome to the teacher's platform! We are here to help improve your teaching experience. Start developing effective and innovative teaching strategies. Develop your students' skills and be part of their success.
unknown_error: An error occurred, please try again later
error_short_password: Password must be at least 8 characters
video_unsupported: This video is not supported on your device or an error occurred
payout_intro_body: These terms govern the payout process for teachers within the Sintir app. By requesting a payout, you agree to all the terms on this page.
payout_method_body: All payouts are processed via the Paymob payment gateway. Enter the payout information correctly (e.g., account number or wallet number). Any incorrect data may delay or cancel the transfer.
payout_eligibility_body:
You are eligible to request a payout if the following conditions are met:
1. Completion of account verification (KYC) if required.
2. Active teacher account on Sintir.
3. Earnings come from legitimate transactions accepted by the platform.
payout_minimum_body: The minimum payout is determined according to Paymob and platform policies. Requests below the minimum will not be processed until the required balance is reached.
payout_processing_body: Payouts typically take 2 to 5 business days depending on Paymob and the bank or wallet provider. Additional delays may occur on public holidays or weekends.
payout_fees_body:
1. A 5% platform fee is deducted from each sale before calculating your withdrawable balance.
2. Paymob or the bank may charge additional processing or transfer fees depending on the payout method.
3. Any international bank or currency conversion fees are borne by the user.
payout_update_info_body: You are responsible for ensuring your payout information is correct and up-to-date. If incorrect information causes delays or lost transfers, Sintir is not liable unless proven otherwise.
payout_refunds_body: If a student requests a refund for a paid amount or a payment is canceled, the refunded amount will be deducted from your balance. If the balance is insufficient, the amount will be deducted from future payments.
payout_fraud_body: Any payout may be suspended, frozen, or canceled if the platform or payment gateway detects suspicious or fraudulent activity. The platform reserves the right to audit transactions and request additional documents to complete the payout.
payout_support_body: For any payout-related issues, contact Sintir support first through the app. For technical transfer delays or issues related to the payment gateway, you may be asked to contact Paymob support and provide the transaction ID.
payout_acceptance_body: By requesting a payout, you confirm your acceptance of all the above terms. The platform may update these terms from time to time. If terms change, you will be notified and may need to re-accept the updated version before future payouts.
term_1:
Compliance with laws-
Teachers must comply with all applicable local and national laws and regulations when delivering educational content.
No illegal, offensive, or copyright-infringing content is allowed.
term_2:
Content Quality:
Teachers are expected to provide high-quality and accurate educational content.
Content must be professionally prepared and meet students' needs.
term_3:
Respect for Students:
Teachers must treat students with respect and courtesy, refraining from any inappropriate or discriminatory behavior.
Maintain the confidentiality of students' personal information and do not share it with any third party.
term_4:
Payment Policy:
Teachers will receive payments according to the payment terms set in the app.
Accurate financial information must be provided to ensure timely payment.
term_5:
Account Termination:
Sintir reserves the right to terminate a teacher's account if any of these terms are violated.
Teachers may cancel their account at any time, provided all current obligations to students are fulfilled.
term_6:
Updates and Modifications:
Sintir reserves the right to amend these terms at any time.
Teachers will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of the platform implies acceptance of the new terms.
term_7:
Disclaimer:
Sintir is not responsible for any errors or losses arising from content provided by teachers.
Teachers bear full responsibility for the content they publish.
student_terms_intro_text: By using the Sintir app, students agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. These terms govern the use of the platform, including all interactions with teachers and other students.
student_terms_usage_text: Students must use the app for educational purposes only. Any inappropriate behavior, such as harassment, sharing illegal content, or disrupting the learning environment, will result in account suspension.
student_terms_payments_text: Course payments are non-refundable, except in cases where the course is canceled by the teacher. Students must ensure they meet all course requirements before enrolling.
student_terms_privacy_text: The Sintir app respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. Please refer to our privacy policy to learn more about how we collect, use, and protect your information.
student_terms_changes_text: Sintir reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Students will be notified of any changes, and continued use of the app after changes means acceptance of the new terms.
